posts.post_content:
Posted By: steve yawitz
Hopefully I'm not the only one who inadvertently buys cards he already has, but two of my last three T206 purchases were exact dupes. Same back and everything. So I now have a spare T206 Hart, which I cracked out of an SGC 40 holder. I'd actually prefer trading it for a VG Southern Leaguer I still need, but cold, hard cash - or its virtual equivalent - would work, too.

Thanks,
Steve
